Thanks, I'm so glad my favorite show is finally back. This true blood season premiere makes vampire diaries looks like a series for little kids :)

Vampire Diaries is For Teens While True Blood is for Adults. But for me Vampire Diaries is much better since i still cant Stand the MAin Character Girl in Tru Blood and the vampires in Diaries are more badass
I can't stand Sookie either. I rather the story in TB revolve around Bill and Eric rather than her. Girl's so irritating I wanna kick her in the Jejunum.
WATCH OUT! I was informed by Comcast that this torrent was copyright infringed. So this is most likely a TRAP!
